txt.en: DNT
Bring the banded gold to Dargumë
Dargumë can be found at Asbaj-khîrfin.\n\nYou should bring the banded gold to Dargumë.
Talk to Dargumë
Collected banded gold ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect banded gold ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Other minerals are mixed with this marble, making for an impure stone
Dargumë can be found in Asbaj-khîrfin.\n\nYou should talk to Dargumë.
Various stones can be found nearby in Asbaj-khîrfin.\n\nYou should appraise each of the various stones.
A Most Valuable Stone
The elegant banding would make this a highly sought out stone for jewellery making
<rgb=#FF0000>Appraise</rgb> the banded gold

'[placeholder], perhaps you can assist me with something. I have acquired four types of minerals that I have found in Máttugard. I am having a difficult time deciding which one to seek out first. Would you examine the four samples and give me your opinion?'
Dargumë, a treasure hunter, seeks assistance with gathering the most valuable minerals to be found in Máttugard.

'The banded gold you say? Yes I was leaning towards that mineral as well! That amethyst is quite beautiful though. I am torn!\n\n'Ah, what if we each collect one type of stone? I will attempt to collect some more of the amethyst and you can search for the banded gold. What do you say?'
Banded gold can be found in northern Máttugard.\n\nYou should collect banded gold.
<rgb=#FF0000>Appraise</rgb> the copper
<rgb=#FF0000>Appraise</rgb> the amethyst
'Wonderful! I was able to find an adequate amount of amethyst as well! Thank you! These will make fine jewellery in the hands of skilled crafters!'
This copper is acceptable for making various kitchen-ware
While this amethyst is beautiful, it is not the highest quality that you have seen
<rgb=#FF0000>Appraise</rgb> the marble
